array.string: export PATH="/usr/local/bin:${PATH}" COREOS_PATH=$(readlink "${HOME}/.coreos-vagrant") ! which vagrant &> /dev/null || [ ! -d ${COREOS_PATH} ] && exit 0 COREOS_INSTANCE=$(vagrant global-status | awk -v coreos_path=${COREOS_PATH} 'match($5, coreos_path) {print $1,$4}') if [ -z ${COREOS_INSTANCE} ] then cd ${COREOS_PATH} && vagrant up | logger -i -t COREOS_VAGRANT elif [ 'running' != $(echo ${COREOS_INSTANCE} | awk '{print $2}') ] then vagrant up $(echo ${COREOS_INSTANCE} | awk '{print $1}') | logger -i -t COREOS_VAGRANT fi
